00040 Entree& Postraitement_base::readOn(Entree& is)
00041 {
00042   Cerr<<"Reading of data for a "<<que_suis_je()<<" post-processing object "<<finl;
00043   Param param(que_suis_je());
00044   set_param(param);
00045   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00046   return is;
00047 }
00048 
00049 int Postraitement_base::lire_motcle_non_standard(const Motcle& mot, Entree& is)
00050 {
00051   Cerr << mot << " is not a keyword understood by " << que_suis_je() << " in lire_motcle_non_standard"<< finl;
00052   exit();
00053   return -1;
00054 }
